  • Method Details

    • findByLoginAndPassword

      Utente findByLoginAndPassword(String login, String password)
      Finds a user by its username and its password. This function is used in the login function.
      Parameters:
      login - the login
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the utente

    • findByLogin

      Utente findByLogin(String login)
      Finds a user by its username.
      Parameters:
      login - the login
      Returns:
      the utente

    • findGenericoById

      UtenteGenerico findGenericoById(int id)
      Finds a generic user from a given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id
      Returns:
      the utente generico

    • findGenericoByDetails

      UtenteGenerico findGenericoByDetails(String nome, String cognome, String numeroDocumento)
      Finds a generic user by its name, surname and document number.
      Parameters:
      nome - the nome
      cognome - the cognome
      numeroDocumento - the numero documento
      Returns:
      the utente generico

    • save

      void save(String nome, String cognome, String numeroDocumento, String login, String password)
      Inserts a user in the database. (Registration)
      Parameters:
      nome - the nome
      cognome - the cognome
      numeroDocumento - the numero documento
      login - the login
      password - the password
